why is my video overlay not working?: is v4l installed by default on ubuntu?
tvtime wont work because i cant get video overlay
wouldnt happen to have anything to do with xv not working
Multimedia Systems Selector gives me a
Failed to construct test pipeline for XWindows (x11/XShm/Xv)
well, then xv is not enabled
and that can be rectified how?
by editing the xorg.conf and adding the line Option "VideoOverlay" "on" in the device section for the graphic adapter
you can select the Default Sink
note that when you're  using the ati drivers you cannot enable OpenGL Overlay and Video Overlay at the same time
